channel.description: Recent content in Simon on ₿itcoin Transcripts

item.title: Mempool-space – helping Bitcoin migrate to a multi-layer ecosystem
item.description: podcast: https://stephanlivera.com/episode/245/ Stephan Livera: Wiz and Simon. Welcome to the show. Simon: Thank you. Wiz: Yeah, thanks for having us. Stephan Livera: So, Wiz I think my listeners are already familiar with you. But let’s hear from you Simon. Tell us about yourself. Simon: I grew up in Sweden. I worked there as a software developer and about four years ago I decided to quit my day job and pursue a more nomadic lifestyle.
